marklogic.body:
When is a campaign not a campaign? Gingrich is no longer traveling and has no ads up in Wisconsin. And there are no more debates for free advertising, so he has to rely on Spots on cable news to remind people he's still running.
Gingrich seems to be doing what he's Always done: hold out for the best deal to pad his resume or fatten his wallet. But at this late point it's unclear what if anything he has left to offer. Gingrich has walrus-like thick skin so he can handle ridicule but he cannot handle being ignored.
